content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1942 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 47.
1946 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 107.
1957 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 204.
1962 - Ancrene Wisse is published.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Hans-JÃ¶rg Modlmayr.
1989 - Actor Nicholas Hoult is born.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Frodo and Samwise rest in Rivendell and prepare for their quest to destroy the One Ring.
